section.name: Hippo ECM, 100% Open Source Enterprise Content Management.
section.p:
Hippo is targeted at medium to large organizations managing content for multi-channel distribution like web sites, intranet and print. It facilitates an open and flexible way of using your information by following internationally accepted open standards.
Hippo differentiates itself from other ECM and CMS systems by its clean separation of content storage, management and presentation.

subsection.name: How to get support
subsection.p: Support for Hippo ECM is available in a variety of different forms.
To get started, search the documentation, the wiki, issue tracker, or the mailing list archives to see if the problem has been solved or reported before.

If the problem has not been reported before, the recommended way to get help is to subscribe to the Hippo ECM mailing list. Many other users and Hippo ECM developers will answer your questions there, and the answer will be archived for others in the future.
Commercial support is provided by Hippo.
